quote: I literally wouldn't leave people alone. I made sure I did it in a way that wasn't too overbearing but was very responsive and consistent.
why_clipworthy: It highlights a specific approach to lead generation through persistence and consistency.
suggested_hook: Want to know the secret to effective lead generation? Consistency is key!

quote: I believe in being just yourself and I love colors. I think there is a way to still have your fashion sense and your style and incorporate that into your showings.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to embrace their personal style as part of their professional brand.
suggested_hook: Your personal style can be your secret weapon in real estate.
